name: EREFIA
description:
1014 of the birth of the Emperor. As a result of internal conflicts among the leaders of the barbarian clans, once a great empire received an opportunity to regain their ancestral lands. Thanks to the will of the inhabitants of border regions, the peninsula back into the empire. However, the land is not cleared by the savage forces, who are struggling to keep once they seized the territory.
 You have been chosen by Emperor, to bring light to the land, establishing law and order. Sword and diplomacy you will be the will of the Emperor, punishing force savages light, freeing the countryside outside the village. Your sacred duty to eradicate this evil, to ensure the safety of the inhabitants of the empire.

Features:
  • The huge open world with many quests
  • Exceptional story
  • Classic RPG system
  • Hundreds of dialogue and dozens of existing characters
